meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>char</kanji> <kanji>point</kanji> is the part you're looking at so hard it burns a little hole in it. Just imagine yourself looking at a single point so hard that it begins to smolder. This is the <vocabulary>focal point</vocabulary> or the <vocabulary>focus</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
